themes.description: Covers issues related to trading functionalities, data export, order execution, and discrepancies in displayed prices or trade details.
Issues related to account opening, activation, segment activation, KYC, and other administrative aspects of managing a trading account.
Reviews related to investment returns, profits, or losses.
Reviews concerning the activation, deactivation, or general management of application features and settings.
Reviews alleging fraudulent activity, scam applications, or significant financial loss due to deceptive practices.
Reviews questioning the app's authenticity, trustworthiness, or alleging fraudulent practices, including concerns about money being held without justification.
Reviews concerning the app's user interface, design, navigation, ease of use, or overall user experience.
This theme covers suggestions for new investment products, features, or improvements to existing investment options and promotional offers.
Issues related to the application's performance, display, or functionality on specific devices, screen sizes, or operating systems.
Suggestions or inquiries about new products, investment options, or general application features not currently available.
Suggestions for new features, enhancements, or additional data/tools within the application.
This theme covers feedback and requests regarding the application's general features, information display, or user interface elements.
Reviews expressing concerns about the platform's trustworthiness, accusations of fraud, or misleading practices that result in financial loss or deception.
Issues related to the receipt or calculation of investment returns, such as dividends, interest, or capital gains.
Suggestions for new features or enhancements to existing functionalities.
Covers feedback related to the overall usability, interface design, and ease of navigation within the platform.
Suggestions for new features, interface updates, or enhancements to existing functionalities.
This theme covers problems related to KYC verification, account activation, profile updates, and other account-specific restrictions.
This theme covers feedback and requests related to the functionality, availability, and improvement of specific product features like charts, screeners, or other trading tools.
This theme covers reviews related to user trust, security concerns, allegations of fraud, or general business integrity issues.
Covers overall positive or negative feedback about the app's general quality, usability, or satisfaction without specific issues.
This theme covers general positive feedback, satisfaction, and compliments about the app's overall quality or usefulness.
Overall positive or negative feedback about the application's general usability or satisfaction, without specific issues.
Concerns related to account safety, unauthorized access, fraudulent activities, or suspicious balance changes.
This theme addresses user concerns regarding data privacy, account security, unauthorized access, and overall application security.
Issues related to account setup, verification, or activation of specific trading segments like F&O.
This theme covers problems with account setup, activation, verification, or access to account features.

This theme covers feedback related to the results or success rates of investment applications, such as IPO allotments or other investment scheme outcomes. It addresses user satisfaction with the final result of their investment actions.
